heroSection.title: Ebooks and Guides
heroSection.description: Check out our free ebooks and guides. You’ll find helpful how-to's, industry trends, best practices and more to help grow your ecommerce business.

replatformingGuide.title: Replatforming Guide: A Roadmap for Migrating Your Ecommerce Store
description: Our team at BigCommerce understands the replatforming process, having worked with numerous enterprises to migrate their stores — and we’re here to help you every step of the way.
In this comprehensive guide, we walk through the five essential steps for managing a platform migration and provide migration success stories from our very own BigCommerce merchants.
